column4: Hexidigit_ : I just thought it deletes temperary package downloads (like clearing a cache), but I don't want to delete anythin necessary.
the man discription isn't very clear

apt-get clean removes all debs from cache, auto-clean only removes debs of old software, it won't cause problems other than the fact that you will have to re-download the debs if you need to reinstall them or whatever
